      • register

        public static IpCamDevice register(String name,
                   URL url,
                   IpCamMode mode,
                   IpCamAuth auth)
        Register new IP camera device.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the device
        url - the URL to be used
        mode - the camera mode to be used
        auth - the optional settings if device supports authentication
        Returns:
        Return newly created IP camera device object
